titleStmt.title: The preaching of Christ and the prison of God, as the certain portion of them that reject Christ's word opened in several sermons on 1 Peter III. 19 / by Samuel Tomlyns ...
titleStmt.author: Tomlyns, Samuel, 1632 or 3-1700.

notesStmt.note: Incorrectly listed in reel guide as 991:9.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
